messages.subject: idea for Nancy K
messages.msgSnippet: Hi dear listmates- I mostly just lurk on this list - as a very busy homebiz owner and mom to two unschooled teens and one Waldorf schooled 10 year old - but
messages.messageBody:
Hi dear listmates-
I mostly just lurk on this list - as a very busy homebiz owner and mom to
two unschooled teens and one Waldorf schooled 10 year old - but the post of
Nancy K caught me eye. I wanted to humbly suggest homeopathy for your son.
It has worked wonders for our family in both the areas of illness and also
behaviorally with one son showing severe obsessive-complusive tendencies.
If you have access to a good homeopathic physician - do take the time to
schedule a visit and see if it can help your Thomas.
Sending support, Lee
North Country Farms
An Organic Family Farm & Tropical Bed and Breakfast
P.O. Box 723
Kilauea, HI 96754
